title: Circles
quote: The life of man is a self-evolving circle, which, from a ring imperceptibly small, rushes on all sides outwards to new and larger circles, and that without end. The extent to which this generation of circles, wheel without wheel, will go, depends on the force or truth of the individual soul.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

title: Triangles
quote: Climb the mountains and get their good tidings. Nature's peace will flow into you as sunshine flows into trees. The winds will blow their own freshness into you, and the storms their energy, while cares will drop away from you like the leaves of Autumn.
author: John Muir

title: Squares
quote: The Internet is becoming the town square for the global village of tomorrow.
author: Bill Gates
